title: Coach Settings
liveSessionRateNoteShort: Your per-minute rate for Live Sessions
liveSessionRateNote: Set your per-minute rate for instant Live Sessions.
baseRateNote: This is the default hourly rate for your services. Session-specific rates can be set below.
noSessionTypesDefined: There are no session types defined yet. Please add some first to manage their visibility here.
sessionTypeRatesNote: Set individual rates for different session types
timeBasedRatesNote: Define different rates for various times of day
specialPeriodsNote: Set up special time periods with specific rates
platformRuleCoachCancel: Coach-initiated cancellations always result in a 100% refund to the client.
platformRuleFeeHandling: Platform fees are adjusted proportionally based on the refunded amount.
grossRatesInfo: Important: All rates you enter are gross rates. Applicable VAT and platform fees will be deducted from these amounts.
minNoticeClientCancellationTooltip: Clients cannot self-cancel if fewer than these hours remain before the session.
minNoticeClientCancellationTooltipWebina: Clients cannot self-cancel their webinar registration if fewer than these hours remain.
additionalNotesPlaceholder: e.g., Exceptions for emergencies are handled on a case-by-case basis.
additionalNotesPlaceholderWebinar: e.g., Special conditions for accessing webinar materials after cancellation.
additionalNotesInfoWebinar: e.g., Special conditions for accessing webinar materials after cancellation.
allowClientInitiatedRescheduleHoursBefor: Client can request reschedule up to X hrs before
allowClientRescheduleHoursTooltip: Hours before session start within which a client can request a reschedule.
clientRescheduleApprovalModeTooltip: Define how client reschedule requests are handled.
approvalModeCoachApprovalIfLate: Automatic for early, Coach approval for late requests
errorMinNoticeOneOnOne: 1-on-1: The minimum notice for client cancellations should be less than or equal to the hours of your lowest refund tier, or you should have a 0% refund tier at or below that notice period.
errorMinNoticeWebinar: Webinar: The minimum notice for client cancellations should be less than or equal to the hours of your lowest refund tier, or you should have a 0% refund tier at or below that notice period.
simplePolicyTooltip: Set the number of hours before a 1:1 session a client must cancel to receive a 100% refund. This is the primary cancellation rule.
simplePolicyHelperTextOneOnOne: Clients get a 100% refund if they cancel more than this many hours in advance. Other scenarios (e.g., partial refunds, late cancellation fee) can be set in the advanced policy.
simplePolicyTooltipWebinar: Set the number of hours before a webinar a client must cancel their registration to receive a 100% refund.
simplePolicyHelperTextWebinar: Clients get a 100% refund if they cancel their registration more than this many hours in advance. More complex rules can be set in the advanced policy.
advancedPolicyTierInfo: The first tier is linked to the simple setting above. Advanced settings allow for more granular control over refund percentages for different cancellation windows.
advancedPolicyTierInfoWebinar: The first tier is linked to the simple setting above. Advanced settings allow for more granular control for webinars.
hoursBeforeTooltip: Hours before session start that this tier applies to.
refundPercentageTooltip: Percentage of the session fee refunded for this tier.
policyMigratedInfo: The policy has been migrated from the previous numeric setting to the new one.
additionalNotesInfo: General info about additional policy notes, e.g., exceptions for emergencies.
errorInvalidPolicyTiers: Invalid policy tiers. Please ensure all tiers have valid values.
pageSubtitle: Manage your app and account settings.
appearanceDescription: Customize the look and feel of the app.
languageDescription: Choose the language and region for your account.
accountDescription: Manage your profile details, security settings, and notifications.
profileAndBillingDescription: Edit your personal info and payment methods.
securityDescription: Change your password and manage security settings.
notificationsDescription: Set how you'd like to receive notifications.
selectAtLeastOneSessionType: Please select at least one session type.
selectAtLeastOneDay: Please select at least one day.
endTimeMustBeAfterStart: End time must be after start time.
invalidDateRange: End date must be after start date.
startDateMustBeFuture: Start date cannot be in the past.
notificationGroupsComingSoon: Feature coming soon. You'll be able to create groups to send notifications to specific clients only.
freeOvertimeNonNegative: Free overtime duration cannot be negative.
paidOvertimeNonNegative: Paid overtime duration cannot be negative.
overtimeRateRange: Overtime surcharge must be between 0% and 500%.
overtimeRules: Overtime Rules (duration in minutes, surcharge in %)
discountsNote: Create and manage discount codes that clients can apply at checkout. These codes are applied after any other pricing adjustments (e.g., for special periods).
createDiscountDesc: Set up the details for your new discount code. The code cannot be changed after creation.
noDiscounts: No discounts have been created yet.
baseRateNoteShort: Default hourly rate for your services.

validation.codeMin: Code must be at least 3 characters.
validation.entitiesRequired: Please select at least one item.
validation.minPurchaseAmountPositive: Minimum purchase amount must be positive.
validation.usageLimitPositive: Usage limit must be a positive number.

form.limitPerCustomer: Limit to one use per customer
form.searchCustomersPlaceholder: Search for customers by name or email...
form.automaticDesc: This title will be displayed to customers at checkout.
form.scopeDesc: Choose which of your offerings this discount will apply to.

summary.title: Summary
summary.noSummary: Start configuring to see a summary here.
summary.subtitle: A preview of how your discount will be applied.

pills.totalUsesTooltip: Can be used a total of {{count}} times
pills.onePerCustomerTooltip: Each customer can use this discount only once

allowFirmBookingDescription: Allows clients to mark bookings as 'firm' within a specific time window, restricting cancellations or reschedules.
firmBookingThresholdTooltip: The period (in hours) before a session within which clients can confirm a booking as 'firm' if you allow it. This gives you planning security.
firmBookingThresholdDescription: After this deadline, clients can only request sessions and not book them firmly.
showSpecialtiesTooltip: Displays the list of your specialties to help potential clients understand your expertise.
showReviewsAndRating: Show my client reviews and average rating
showReviewsAndRatingTooltip: Builds trust by displaying the ratings and comments from past clients.
showPricingAndSessionTypesTooltip: Gives visitors transparency about your offerings and pricing structure.
showBioTooltip: Share your professional background and coaching philosophy to create a personal connection.
accessLevelPublicDescription: Anyone can see your availability and book a session.
accessLevelPublicTooltip: Maximizes your visibility. Ideal if you want to attract new clients and make the booking process as easy as possible.
accessLevelVettedDescription: Anyone can see your availability, but you must approve new clients before their first booking is confirmed.
accessLevelVettedTooltip: A good balance between openness and control. You can screen new clients before committing.
accessLevelPrivateTooltip: Perfect for coaches with a fixed client base or if you prefer to manage booking requests personally.
showBusyAvailableTooltip: Protects the privacy of your appointments by only showing availability. This is the recommended setting.
showFullCalendarDetailsTooltip: Shows details like 'Coaching 60 min' without revealing personal information. Gives potential clients more context.
allowOvertimeDescription: Set whether you generally allow overtime. This can be adjusted per session and availability slot.
overtimeRulesDescription: Define how much overtime you grant for free and how additional, paid overtime is billed.
freeOvertimeTooltip: A short, unpaid overtime period you grant after each session before paid overtime begins.
paidOvertimeTooltip: The maximum duration of paid overtime, which is billed at your set surcharge after the free overtime has elapsed.
overtimeRateTooltip: The percentage surcharge applied to your per-minute rate for the duration of the paid overtime.
policyPresetsDescription: Choose a template as a starting point or create a custom policy below.

flexible.title: Flexible
flexible.description: Full refund for cancellations more than 24 hours in advance.

moderate.title: Moderate
moderate.description: Full refund up to 72 hrs before, 50% refund up to 24 hrs before.

strict.title: Strict
strict.description: 50% refund up to 72 hrs before, no refund within 72 hrs.

policySummaryLine: Clients get a {{refundPercentage}}% refund for cancellations more than {{hoursBefore}} hours in advance.

taxForm.title: Tax and Invoice Information
taxForm.description: This information is required to generate compliant invoices for your earnings.
taxForm.errorLoading: Could not load your tax information.
taxForm.successUpdating: Your tax information has been successfully updated.
taxForm.errorUpdating: Could not save your tax information.

authRequired: You must be logged in to access this page.
billingPageDescription: Manage your payment methods, view your full payment history, and download invoices.

billing.historyDescription: Here is a list of all your past payments and invoices.
billing.noInvoicesDescription: Your payment history will appear here once you've made your first purchase.
billing.detailsDescription: Make sure your billing address is up to date for correct invoicing and tax calculations.
billing.title: Billing & Payments
billing.description: Manage your billing address and view your payment history.
billing.downloadError: Could not retrieve download link. Please try again.
billing.errorDescription: There was a problem retrieving your payment history. Please try again later.
billing.navigationDescription: Your billing details and payment history are managed on a dedicated page for clarity and security.
billing.navigationContent: Click the button below to manage your billing address, view your payment history, and download invoices.

pricingHierarchyInfo: If a session qualifies for multiple automatic discounts (e.g., special period & time-based rate), the system will automatically apply the one most beneficial to the client. Discount codes are checked separately.
errorOverlappingPeriod: This period overlaps with an existing one for the same session type.
profileContentVisibilityDesc: Control who can see specific parts of your profile.
showPricingDescV2: Control who can see your service prices.

insurance.title: Insurance Recognition
insurance.description: Manage your recognitions with health insurance providers and submit the required documents for verification.
insurance.isRecognizedLabel: I am recognized by Swiss health insurance providers.
insurance.noRegistries: No registries have been added yet.
insurance.duplicateNameError: This registry name has already been added.
insurance.uploadError: File upload failed. Please try again.
insurance.rejectionReason.doc_illegible: The document is illegible or blurry.
insurance.rejectionReason.name_mismatch: The name on the document does not match the profile.
